name: Farm Tattoo Parlour Shop Pro
description:
Welcome to the Farm Tattoo Parlour Shop, a fab tattoo designs studio where you get to draw amazing super tattoo art in farm themed tattoo salon in the tattoo simulator. As the tattoo artist in this art style filled fashion world, draw multiple tattoo art on clients’ body parts.

OXO Games Studio brings a fab Farm Tattoo Simulator game in the category of tattoo games and causal games. A top ranking tattoo salon with a top artist who loves drawing art on body parts of clients in a tattoo fashion studio with unique parlour designs.

FEATURES:
• Many tattoo art draw levels
• Perform cleaning on body parts before drawing art
• A farm themed tattoo designs studio
• An amazing tattoo maker artist simulator
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Smooth and easy tattoo style art drawing controls
• Free to play forever
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
